content: You guys can beat up Obama all day long for this but the fact is it's not his fault. Our culture and laws always cater to and go after the crooks and then the inocent law biding ones are the ones that get screwed. This can be exampled in just about every thing we do. This goes for many of of laws, freedoms and liberties. You first accepted this type of treatment when you started allowing the Fed government to take your money for taxes instead of placing a tax on sales. So who is really just as guilty? I think we all are. But we can change that, if people work together for that change and starting with our tax system would be a great first step. If you don't want to do it for yourself, work for your children and grand children so they can have it better. It's all about showing our governments that congress and our government works for us, not the other way around.

Dave About 2.5 million google hits in 2 seconds infer that you, and Russ Feingold could be wrong, Dave. >http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assault_rifle That's the wiki post. The term 'assault rifle' is an english tanslation of the German 'sturmgewehr' - a class of WW2 infantry weapon, much like the machine pistol, but utilizing an adapted military rifle cartridge as opposed to a pistol round. The weapon combined an increased rate of fire, with extended range and accuracy out to a max of 150 m. The smaller cartridge meant more ammuntion could be carried per unit weight. You don't think somebody couldn't turn you into a bleeder with a plastic knife Dave? Like the gun, it's the 'assault' part that's more important in the definition.
